overview.purpose: Clarify adoption of Ready Set Ford campaign and provide implementation rules across channels and sub-brands.
overview.context: All RSF materials must follow Playbook 1.0.

what_is_ready_set_ford.definition: A global brand campaign expressing Ford’s highest form of capability and passion.
what_is_ready_set_ford.tagline: You’re more capable than you think
rsf_purpose: Signals modernization of Ford marketing globally.

rsf_is: An interdependent system of POV, TOV, imagery, design, and tagline.
For advertising aligned with RSF strategy.
Manifestation of the Global Brand Strategy.
rsf_is_not: Not the Global Brand Identity System.
Not used for all Ford communications.

relationship.role: RSF expresses strategy; it does not replace identity.

questions: Is it aligned to RSF strategy (You're more capable than you think)?
Can it deliver TOV, imagery, design + tagline?

outcomes.if_any_no: Use Brand Identity System or consult Brand Office.

key_elements.strategy_description: Ford enables human capability; RSF expresses this globally.
key_elements.required_visibility: Any piece using RSF must express this ethos.

rules: Primary corporate trademark.
Use Ford Blue unless otherwise restricted.

usage: Tier 1 <15s and static: RSF graphic only.
Tier 1 >15s: RSF end + BFT shield (preferred slam).

rules_of_one_and_two.rule_of_one: Single-frame assets may ONLY include ONE trademark or lockup.
rules_of_one_and_two.rule_of_two: Multi-frame assets may include a MAX of two brand assets: RSF lockup + Ford Oval (or sub-brand logo).

partnership_usage.must: Use Ford Oval as brand representation.
partnership_usage.must_not: Do not use RSF lockup as primary partnership brand.

skyview_usage: Avoid full floods in entire experiences.
Always balanced with Off Black and white.
ford_blue_rules: Must appear in logos and end frames.
Do not mix blue floods with Skyview text.
Never let background colors show through the Oval.

ford_f1_rules: Ford F-1 remains primary for long-term branded components.
American Grotesk allowed only for campaign-specific placements.
Do not convert entire templates to American Grotesk.

rules: Big Words: maximize headline width/height.
Even Divided Spaces: max 4 quadrants.
Tight Margins: 2%–10%; gutters = margins.
Stick to the Poles: align to corners.
Tagline Scale: follow playbook proportions; TM may hang in margin.

imagery_style.intent: Vehicles and people equally heroed; imagery enables human capability.
